trans-unit.source: Provides a formatter-friendly mechanism for parsing the data in <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對解析 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 中的資料，提供易用的格式子 (Formatter) 機制。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The current class is a standard enumerator that parses over the values stored in <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的類別是標準的列舉值中所儲存值透過剖析<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Instead of recording the values, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator> keeps pointers to the member variables of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> that created it.
trans-unit.target: 而不是記錄的值，<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator>會保留指標的成員變數<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>建立的。

trans-unit.source: This class follows the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別遵循<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>機制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices> class in order to properly serialize or deserialize an object where the base class does not implement <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> but the derived class does.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices>類別才能正確序列化或還原序列化的物件的基底類別未實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>但衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前正在檢查的項目。

trans-unit.source: The item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在檢查的項目。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator has not started enumerating items or has reached the end of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值已經開始列舉項目，或已經達到列舉型別的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Updates the enumerator to the next item.
trans-unit.target: 更新列舉值至下一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a new element is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已找到新的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To initialize the enumerator, call <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and go through each item until you reach the last element.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化的列舉值，呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>並瀏覽每個項目，直到您到達最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前正在檢查的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The item name.
trans-unit.target: 項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator has not started enumerating items or has reached the end of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值已經開始列舉項目，或已經達到列舉型別的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前正在檢查的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在檢查的項目型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.ObjectType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.ObjectType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator has not started enumerating items or has reached the end of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值已經開始列舉項目，或已經達到列舉型別的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Resets the enumerator to the first item.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉值重設為第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Current%2A> property will contain the first item in the current set of elements.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法後,<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性會包含目前的資料集的項目中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的目前項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationEntry" /> that contains the current serialization data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationEntry" />，包含目前序列化 (Serialization) 資料。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration has not started or has already ended.
trans-unit.target: 列舉尚未啟動或已結束。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前正在檢查的項目值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item currently being examined.
trans-unit.target: 目前正在檢查的項目值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfoEnumerator.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator has not started enumerating items or has reached the end of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值已經開始列舉項目，或已經達到列舉型別的結尾。
